translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Triad in Direct and Reverse Order

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.41. Cittasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika🔽Cittasampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  citta sampayutta duka kusala ttika  citta sampayuttam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na citta sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The Dyad on Associated with Consciousness and Wholesome

original: Cittasampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: citta sampayuttam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na citta sampayuttaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka abyākata mūlam tīṇi eva paccaya vasena
